job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <p>Our client is a late-stage software security unicorn currently experiencing exponential growth from an unprecedented increase in market demand. This is an opportunity to partake in an IPO and make a substantial impact on the product within a growing engineering organization.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>As a member of the Platform Engineering Team, you will design, develop, and deploy code critical to maintaining software on different platforms, bridging the gap between hardware and software.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>Are you ready for a highly collaborative and exhilarating work environment?&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Responsibilities you will take on:</strong>&nbsp;</p><ul><li>Design, Develop and Deploy Code (80%)&nbsp;&nbsp;</li><li>Implement Python tooling (scripts, APIs) for the development team and the product&nbsp;</li><li>Use&nbsp;relational and non-relational databases to&nbsp;promote data flow&nbsp;</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Your Profile:</strong>&nbsp;</p><ul><li>BS or MS (STEM Degree) </li><li>1-3+ years of&nbsp;experience designing and&nbsp;deploying&nbsp;software&nbsp;</li><li>Proficiency&nbsp;with modern programming languages&nbsp;such as Python or&nbsp;Modern C++</li><li>Experience with&nbsp;Unix/Linux&nbsp;</li><li>Comfortable&nbsp;debugging, testing, and documenting&nbsp;</li></ul><p><strong>Nice to have:</strong>&nbsp;</p><ul><li>Cloud computing experience (AWS, Azure,&nbsp;etc)&nbsp;</li><li>Familiarity with&nbsp;CI/CD systems&nbsp;</li><li>Experience with infrastructure as code, such as Terraform&nbsp;</li><li>Docker and/or&nbsp;Podman&nbsp;exposure&nbsp;</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p><p>If you are currently open to new opportunities and want to take your career to the next level, please contact me to discuss this opportunity along with alternative&nbsp;Engineering&nbsp;positions within the Austin Computer Software Technology Space.&nbsp;</p><p>All conversations are confidential, and we will only submit your information after attaining your consent.&nbsp;</p>
